Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: (\{ "The limousine south of here is your personal space, where you can put things you do not want to lose. You are also able to invite others into your limousine, by simply opening the door and telling them to enter before yourself (the door will close in their faces if you enter before them). Everyone has their own limousine, which is their own space." \})

(\{ "I can remember names and information regarding people. Try telling me something about yourself in the form \\"I am \.\\" For example, if you tell me \\"I am in Stockholm, Sweden\\", when people ask about you, I will respond that you are in Stockholm, Sweden. If you then tell me \\"I am a woodcutter\\" I will remember the two things, and will say that you are \\"in Stockholm, Sweden; a woodcutter.\\" I can remember quite a lot but try not to spam everybody with information. If information gets old or inaccurate, you can tell me to forget about a particular entry. Try telling me \\"Forget I am a woodcutter\\" and I will promptly begin to say that you are \\"in Stockholm, Sweden\\" only, and not include the woodcutter-detail (we all know how embarrassing that stuff can get; my discretion is, of course, guaranteed)." \})
